Bash(python3 -c "
from base64 import b64decode
import os

# Minimal 1x1 transparent PNG
png_data = b64decode\(''iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAADUlEQVR42mNk+M9QDwADhgGAWjR9awAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==''\)

assets_dir = r''C:\\Temp\\tsscat\\DefaultApp\\DefaultApp\\Assets''
files = [''StoreLogo.png'', ''Square150x150Logo.png'', ''Square44x44Logo.png'', ''Wide310x150Logo.png'', ''SplashScreen.png'']

for f in files:
    with open\(os.path.join\(assets_dir, f\), ''wb''\) as fp:
        fp.write\(png_data\)
    print\(f''Created {f}''\)
")
